rules_text:
Flash
When Wriggle Nightbug enters, create two 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.
flavor_text:
[i]“When it comes to youkai humans find unpleasant, Wriggle Nightbug is a good example... she always appears with a large number of bugs and can control them at will.”
—Hieda no Akyuu, [/i]The Gensokyo Chronicle[i][/i]
